osnap.data.Community.to_crs¶

Community.to_crs(crs=None, epsg=None, inplace=False)[source]¶

Transform all geometries in the study area to a new coordinate reference system.

Parameters:
crs : dict or str

Output projection parameters as string or in dictionary form.

epsg : int

EPSG code specifying output projection.

inplace : bool, optional, default: False

Whether to return a new GeoDataFrame or do the transformation in place.
